definition: an unexpected slide, move obliquely or sideways, usually in an uncontrolled manner
details:
noun
- an unexpected slide
= synonyms: slip
- a restraint provided when the brake linings are moved hydraulically against the brake drum to retard the wheel's rotation
= synonyms: brake shoe, shoe
- one of a pair of planks used to make a track for rolling or sliding objects
verb
- move obliquely or sideways, usually in an uncontrolled manner
= example: move obliquely or sideways, usually in an uncontrolled manner
= synonyms: slip
- slide without control
= example: slide without control
- apply a brake or skid to
- elevate onto skids
